IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: RAISE MONEY TO DONATE TO PACE ACADEMY FOR BUILDING IMPROVEMENTS,CLASSROOM MATERIALS AND PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: RAISE MONEY TO DONATE TO PACE ACADEMY FOR BUILDING IMPROVEMENTS,CLASSROOM MATERIALS AND PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT.

Activity3.Description: LEARNING SPECIALIST PROGRAM FOR LOWER SCHOOL

ActivityOther.Description: PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND OTHER VARIOUS ACTIVITIES

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS INSIDE THE UNITED STATES
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: WE ARE PROVIDED WITH AN ACCOUNTING OF ALL GRANT MONIES USED BY THE CFO OF PACE ACADEMY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: EXPLANATION ON VOLUNTEERS AND TYPES OF SERVICES OR BENEFITS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ESTIMATE IS BASED ON THE ASSUMPTION THAT 2/3 OF FAMILIES HAVE AT LEAST ONE PARENT VOLUNTEER AND WE HAD 688 FAMILIES AT PACE ACADEMY THIS YEAR. VOLUNTEER SERVICES INCLUDE MAKING AND DELIVERING MEALS TO PACE FAMILIES FACING CRISIS, DECORATING THE CAMPUS FOR THE HOLIDAYS, ORGANIZING FUNDRAISERS, VOLUNTEERING AT OUR FUNDRAISING EVENTS, ORGANIZING PARENT EDUCATION CLASSES, SERVING AS HOSPITALITY VOLUNTEERS, STAFFING OUR BOOKSTORE AND SELLING INVENTORY, ORGANIZING TEACHER APPRECIATION EVENTS AND ALSO MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION.
PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND OTHER VARIOUS ACTIVITIES
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12A THE ORGANIZATION HAS THE INTENTION OF ADAPTING A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. IT HAS NOT BEEN FINALIZED BY THE END OF THE YEAR.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: AUTHORITY DELEGATED TO EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE EXPLANATION
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE INCLUDES PRESIDENT, VICE PRESIDENT, PAST PRESIDENT, SECRETARY AND TREASURER, ALL OF WHICH ARE ON THE GOVERNING BODY.
MEMBERS CONSIST OF EACH PARENT OR GUARDIAN HAVING A CHILD ENROLLED AT PACE ACADEMY. MEMBERS ARE ENTITLED TO VOTE UPON ANY AND ALL MATTERS PRESENTED AT ANY MEETING.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ELECTION OF MEMBERS AND THEIR RIGHTS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL MEMBERS ARE ELIGIBLE TO VOTE FOR CANDIDATES PRESENTED BY THE NOMINATING COMMITTEE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: DECISIONS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL OF MEMBERS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A VOTE BY THE MAJORITY OF MEMBERS, ASSUMING THERE IS A QUORUM, SHALL BE THE ACT OF ALL THE MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE TREASURER PREPARES ALL THE NECESSARY SCHEDULES AND PROVIDES ALL THE DOCUMENTS TO SUPPORT THE PREPARATION OF THE FORM 990. A DRAFT COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PRESENTED TO THE EXECUTIVE BOARD.
UPON REQUEST, THE ELECTED PRESIDENT AND TREASURER WOULD BE ABLE TO PROVIDE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
